Text:
Holy Mother [*] of our Redeemer
	Gateway of Heaven,
	Star of the Sea.
Come and help us who fall
	and who desire rise again.

O Wonderful, you gave birth
	to the one who created you,
	and you remained a virgin.
Accept the salvation of the angel Gabriel
	and have mercy on us sinners.
Changes: 2020-10-27 - Paul Prins: First translation of this Antiphon.
